original_text: This is the Lord's message to you: ‘I had done nothing wrong against your ancestors, but they turned away from me. Instead, they worshipped useless idols. So they themselves became useless. This is the Lord's message to you:
korean_text: 나 여호와가 이와 같이 말하노라 너희 조상들이 내게서 무슨 불의함을 보았기에 나를 멀리 하고 가서 헛된 것을 따라 헛되이 행하였느냐

sentences.original_text: This is the Lord's message to you
I had done nothing wrong against your ancestors
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희 조상들에게는 아무 잘못도 행하지 않았으나

sentences.original_text: but they turned away from me
This is the Lord's message to you
